Suffolk Libraries

World Book Day Quiz

Mar 1, 2016 • Matt Shenton

To celebrate World Book Day on Thursday 3rd March we have put together a little quiz for you to try! There are 10 ‘Blanked out Books’ and 10 ‘Emoji book Titles’ to guess (see the examples below) with the answers supplied at the end of the PowerPoint. The quiz is aimed at Key Stage 3. Have fun and let us know how you get on!

World Book Day 2016 Quiz
(Right click and select save as to download the quiz)
